title: Full School Curriculum
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
The Class 6 Scholar Program prepares students for middle school by supporting the complete academic curriculum and promoting independent study habits. Along with school-assigned homework, projects, and tests, our program reinforces comprehension, note-making, exam-writing strategies, and cross-subject thinking through engaging academic modules.

Subjects include English, Hindi, Mathematics, Science, Social Science, Computer Science, GK, and Value Education.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Complete school curriculum and exam preparation, with project and test support
- Concept-based learning kits, revision charts, and creative assessments
- Parent+Child Progress Dashboard to track academic and personality development
- Merit Badges for performance, research skill, punctuality, and innovation
- Builds study independence, exam confidence, and cross-subject reasoning

title: Computer Science
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
In Class 6, CodeVoyagers introduces learners to trending and future-facing technologies like Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), web development, and data visualization — using age-appropriate projects and visual tools. Logical thinking is deepened through real-world simulations, visual coding platforms, and creative tech applications.

This program nurtures early innovators — capable of building, questioning, and understanding how modern tech works.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Hands-on practice in Scratch, MIT App Inventor, web logic (HTML basics), and AI tools
- Brain Gym & Logic Vault featuring real-world simulations, flowcharts, and algorithms
- Creative projects: chatbot design, pixel animation, beginner website structure, and AI storytelling
- Parent+Child Dashboard showing growth in logic, tech comfort, and innovation mindset
- Introduces AI, ML, and modern tech stacks to nurture future-ready digital thinkers

title: Spoken & Written English
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
Cosmic Communicators in Class 6 focuses on developing high-impact communication skills. The program trains students in pronunciation, grammar, listening, and stage presence, while helping them build solid writing skills in essay writing, debates, and structured arguments. Multilingual flexibility is encouraged using Duolingo-powered resources.

We focus on clarity, confidence, expression, and the ability to speak and write with purpose.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Activities include debates, speeches, storytelling, anchoring, and interview formats
- Academic writing practice: essays, opinion pieces, creative writing, and grammar boosters
- Lights, Camera, Confidence! activities for accent correction and stage clarity
- Optional multi language training - may it be French, German, or any other
- Builds globally confident, expressive students with sharp communication skills

title: Mathematics
contentSummary:
Parent Overview:
Class 6 MathMagicians build mastery in math with a deep understanding of logic, applications, and real-world projects. The program includes all core syllabus topics and goes further into pattern recognition, visual problem-solving, and project-based learning. Math becomes a thinking tool — not a memory test.

Learners are introduced to Olympiad-style questions and real-use cases like budgeting, data reading, and construction math.

What makes us different:
- Structured Rayastra’s kit with all expert learning amenities at your home
- Personalized teacher-parent meetings and feedback sessions
- Covers integers, factors, algebra basics, geometry, and data representation
- Brain Gym with logic puzzles, speed drills, and real-world word problems
- Application-based projects: personal finance mockups, blueprint design, and fraction games
- Merit Badges for accuracy, problem-solving, and application depth
- Builds Olympiad-ready skills and confidence in using math practically
